short_summary: Procurement for the SADRE System for Residential School business processes

full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement ### Indigenous Services Canada Supports Single Access for Dispute Resolution Enterprise System (SADRE) [Translation: **title-titre-eng**: Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) supports the Single Access for Dispute Resolution Enterprise System (SADRE) for Residential School business processes]
**Reference Number-numeroReference**: PW-22-01010784 **Solicitation Number-numeroSollicitation**: 1000243552 ## Notice of Proposed Procurement Date of Posting: 21 October 2022 Closing Date: 9 November 2022 ## Background Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the contract D302A ADP SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT SERVICES. This requirement aims to support the ongoing operations of the Single Access for Dispute Resolution Enterprise System (SADRE) for Residential School business processes. ## Services Required ISC requires professional resources with the following qualifications: * One (1) Level 3 - B.1 Business Analyst * One (1) Level 3 - A.1 Application/Software Architect ## Selective Tendering This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following category(ies). ## Trade Agreements The following trade agreements are applicable: * SET-ASIDE PROGRAM FOR INDIAN BUSINESS * CFTA * CCFTA * CPTPP * CETA * WTO-GPA * CPFTA * CPFTA * CUFTA ## Procurement Details * Anticipated Start Date: Date of Contract * Contract Duration: Two (2) years with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods * Solicitation Method: Competitive ## Contact Information * Ha, Elly * Email: ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@sac-isc.gc.ca ## Notice The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language. --- (Note: converted the original entries into more readable markdown with title headings for each section. Presented the rewritten text and kept the translation in one line on the respective section.)
You can also reorganize the entries into **heading 1 - heading 2** format. Please let me know if you want me to do that. Please let me know if I should rewrite
